title: How do I remove search field in the bottom of main display of my google pixel 4a 5G?
content:
I want to remove search field from a bottom of my google pixel 4a 5G it takes a place on display and I'm not using it. I didn't find obvious way to remove it. I even disabled a google service but it didn't help. It's really annoying.
I was advised to do the following on android community, but this didn't help:
Tap and hold your home screen. 
A new menu will appear. 
At the top of the screen will be the Google Search bar. 
Tap and hold it and an option to remove will appear.
There is no remove option.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
